comments.content:
Wow, what a tiny font size!  
Anyway, in this context it's most likely Copperplate [http://www.myfonts.com/search/copperplate/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140319225913/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/copperplate/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/copperplate/fonts/")  
Don

Your image resolution is too low, but #9 must be **[Copperplate](http://web.archive.org/web/20140319225913/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Copperplate%20Gothic%20Std%20-%2032%20BC&fid=11a601d89920b5e32fefdec8d90d228b&fsize=60&text=Sophie%20Rose%20%26%20Daniel%20James%20Preston&wrap=2)**

PS: Too late... Don is faster :)

Hi Fivos, that's a change! Usually I follow in your footsteps :)  
Don
